Race.SpecificTitle: Ward #7 FPD -- 12.17 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward #7 Fire Protection District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Ward #7 Fire Protection District of the Parish of Bienville, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twelve and seventeen hundredths (12.17) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $390,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service Dist. No. 2 -- 6 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Bienville Parish Hospital Service District No. 2, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of six (6) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $1,116,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of paying costs of providing hospital and other health care services in the District, including acquiring, maintaining, operating and supporting facilities, equipment and furnishings therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation District No. 1 -- 3.28 Mills Renewal- BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Bienville Parish Recreation District No. 1, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and twenty-eight hundredths (3.28) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $321,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring lands, buildings, equipment and other facilities, and for the construction and maintenance thereof, and to promote recreation and any related activity within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Wards Four and Five Fire Protection Dist. -- 3.53 Mills Continuation- BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Wards Four and Five Fire Protection District Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Wards Four and Five Fire Protection District of the Parish of Bienville, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a three and fifty-three hundredths (3.53) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $409,480 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, said millage to represent a fourteen hundredths of a mill (.14) increase over the 3.39 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on November 7, 2006?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. 6 -- 7.19 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 6 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Bienville Parish Fire Protection District No. 6, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a seven and nineteen hundredths (7.19) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $481,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or purchasing fire protection equipment and facilities for the District, including payment of salaries in connection therewith?
